Title: Kobo-chan Special (1994)
Description: ['Two ', Kobo-chan, " televised specials that aired after the TV anime's serialization. The 1st special is composed of 4 short stories. The 2nd special received some interrupted broadcasts in some parts of Japan due to an earthquake near the Miyagi Prefecture."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo', 'Other: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo']
